data.text: Nanara, Ala Isirayila yamanan nabeɲinma nɛn
A kelima nɛn, a yi a xuruse kurun naba
A tan yɛtɛɛn nan findima e bɔɲɛ xunbenla ra.
E mangayaan ligama nɛn Asiriya yamanani
Nayi, Yaxubaa yamaan muxu dɔnxɛne luma nɛn
Nayi, Yaxuba bɔnsɔnna muxu dɔnxɛne luma nɛn
Ɛ yiini te ɛ yaxune xili ma,
Alatalaa falan ni ito ra, a naxa,
N na i ya taane kalama nɛn i ya yamanani,
N kɔɛrayaan bama nɛn ɛ yɛ.
N na ɛ suxurene nun ɛ kide gɛmɛne bama nɛn ɛ yii.
N na ɛ Asera kide gbindonne bama nɛn ɛ yii,
N fitinaxina n gbeen ɲɔxɔma nɛn xɔlɔni
